Package com.dms.service

Class DocumentService

java.lang.Object
com.dms.service.DocumentService
@Service public class DocumentService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing documents.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jakub Pavlíček

      Uploads a new version of an existing document.
      Parameters:
      documentId - the ID of the document to which the new version will be uploaded
      file - the multipart file representing the new version
      path - the path where the new version will be stored
      Returns:
      the document with the newly uploaded version

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadDocument(String documentId)
      Retrieves the file from the blob storage service based on the hash of the revision, and returns it as a ResponseEntity.
      Parameters:
      documentId - the ID of the document to download
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the downloaded document as a Resource

    • getDocuments

      Retrieves a page of documents based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number to retrieve
      pageSize - the number of documents per page
      sort - the sorting criteria
      filter - the filtering criteria
      Returns:
      a page containing the requested documents

      documentId - the ID of the document
      pageNumber - the page number to retrieve
      pageSize - the number of revisions per page
      sort - the sorting criteria
      filter - the filtering criteria
      Returns:
      a page containing the revisions of the specified document
